Package com.sebastienguillemin.wswrl.core.rule.variable.binding

Interface BindingCache<V extends WSWRLVariable,T>

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultBindingCache
public interface BindingCache<V extends WSWRLVariable,T>

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addValues(V variable, List<T> values)
     
    void
    bind()
    Bind the current values (referred by pointers) to variables.
    void
    clear()
    Clear the current cache content.
    void
    computePossibilities()
    Compute the binding possibilities of the cache i.e., the cartesian products of all the variable values.
    T
    getCurrent(org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.IRI iri)
    Returns the current value referrenced by the pointer of the variable identified by the iri parameter.
    int
    getPossibilities()
    Returns the number of possibilities of bindings.
    int
    getProcessedPossibilities()
    Returns the number of possibilities that have been processed.
    boolean
    hasNext()
    Indicates whether another binding is available.
    boolean
    isLocked()
    Returns whether this cache is locked.
    void
    lock()
    Locks this cache.
    void
    next()
    Update the internal pointers to the next values.
    void
    releaseLock()
    Releases the lock of the cache.

  • Method Details

    • addValues

      void addValues(V variable, List<T> values)

    • hasNext

      boolean hasNext()
      Indicates whether another binding is available.
      Returns:
      TRue if another binding is available.

    • next

      void next()
      Update the internal pointers to the next values.

    • bind

      void bind()
      Bind the current values (referred by pointers) to variables.

    • getPossibilities

      int getPossibilities()
      Returns the number of possibilities of bindings.
      Returns:
      The number of possibilities of bindings.

    • getProcessedPossibilities

      int getProcessedPossibilities()
      Returns the number of possibilities that have been processed.
      Returns:
      The number of processed possibilities.

    • getCurrent

      T getCurrent(org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.IRI iri)
      Returns the current value referrenced by the pointer of the variable identified by the iri parameter.
      Parameters:
      iri - A variable IRI.
      Returns:
      A value that can be bound to the variable referred by iri.

    • lock

      void lock()
      Locks this cache. This method called computePossibilities().

    • releaseLock

      void releaseLock()
      Releases the lock of the cache.

    • isLocked

      boolean isLocked()
      Returns whether this cache is locked.
      Returns:
      True if the cache is locked, false otherwise.

    • clear

      void clear()
      Clear the current cache content.

    • computePossibilities

      void computePossibilities()
      Compute the binding possibilities of the cache i.e., the cartesian products of all the variable values.
